1. **The Command Bar is too wide (obviously).** \- I couldn't figure anything to change that. Posts.EditableText:
1. After many pointless attempts, I figured a working script to change the command bar:
```
JS.setCss ("input#txtCommand", "width: 955px;")
```

2. Its vertical position was somewhere fixed along the way and I don't know when or why that solved itself.
